readme.summary: The documentation is detailed and provides many examples, but lacks clear installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.

injection_risks.description: The `fs::read_to_string` function is used to read the contents of a file specified by the `ARCH_CONFIG_PATH_RENDERED` environment variable. If an attacker can manipulate this variable, they may be able to inject malicious data into the application.
The `serde_yaml::from_str` function is used to parse a YAML string. If an attacker can manipulate this string, they may be able to inject malicious data into the application.
The `format!` macro is used to construct a URL. While this is not directly vulnerable to injection, it may be possible for an attacker to manipulate the input data and cause unexpected behavior.

critical_findings: Potential injection vulnerability through the `ARCH_CONFIG_PATH_RENDERED` environment variable.
